TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContextEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class TraceContextEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class TraceContextEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 將追蹤記錄的集合提供給處理 事件的任何方法。

span.span: Provides a collection of trace records to any method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會由HTTP 要求處理期間所收集的類別，以提供存取追蹤記錄在所有的追蹤資訊。The class is used by the class to provide access to trace records after all the tracing information is gathered during HTTP request processing. 加入事件處理常式委派以處理事件，您可以處理的記錄、 進行錄製您自己的資料儲存區，或提供它們做為程式碼剖析工具的輸入。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the event, you can process the records, record them to your own data store, or provide them as input to a profiling tool. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範您可以註冊委派以處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此範例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法存取的集合物件透過屬性，逐一查看它們，並將其寫入至回應資料流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection records) cil managed

param.name: records
param.span: 物件的集合，表示為目前要求所記錄的所有追蹤記錄。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent all the trace records logged for the current request.

summary.span: 使用提供的追蹤記錄集合，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the provided collection of trace records.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TraceRecords As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ TraceRecords { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與目前要求相關聯的 訊息集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of messages that are associated with the current request.

value.span: 與目前要求相關聯的追蹤記錄集合。

span.span: A collection of trace records that are associated with the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次呼叫和方法會產生物件加入至訊息集合。Every call to the and methods generates a object that is added to the messages collection. 方法呼叫會設定屬性`true`，而其他的方法呼叫將它設定為`false`。The method call sets the property to `true`, while the other method calls set it to `false`. 您可以逐一訊息，並檢查記錄與特定類別或訊息，以及是否為警告。You can iterate through the messages and examine records with specific categories or messages, and whether they are warnings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範您可以註冊委派以處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a delegate to handle the event. 在此範例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法存取的集合物件透過屬性，逐一查看它們，並將其寫入至回應資料流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method accesses the collection of objects through the property, iterates through them, and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]
